name: Sakura Moonlight
storyline: Yuuki, the facelss male protagonist who is a demon hunter. Together with Sumire, his classmate on Yomihara Academy, he tries to protect Tsukimine from Enma, the demon queen, and her horde of minions. Only a few chosen ones can see the demons and fight them, and Sumire's family has fought them for generations. Yuuki on the other hand, is the first in his family.
summary: The thirtieth game produced by Winged Cloud and the twenty-seventh game in the Sakura series. It is a type of galge game with match 3 elements. It was released in February 2019.
